Given the state \\(u(x,T)\\), can we determine precisely what transformations were applied (whether \\(T(u)\\), \\(S(u)\\), or both), solely by knowing the state at \\(x,T\\)?

The interactions of transformations \\(T(u)\\) and \\(S(u)\\) within the differential equation make it complex to unambiguously determine what interventions were applied.
